short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick mock interview for any jobs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Mock Interview with Mir enables users to extract job descriptions from leading platforms and instantly conduct mock interviews using real-time voice AI technology. The AI simulates interview scenarios and provides detailed, comprehensive feedback on user performance, helping candidates improve and tailor their skills for specific roles. Ideal for job seekers and recruitment professionals looking for a smarter, faster way to prepare for interviews.
